data.actual_result: You need to scroll all the way up to see the new server
data.expected_result: The server you just joined should be visible immediately, as when you join the server through the full invite screen
data.short_description: When joining a server through the Join button of an invite embed, the server list doesn't scroll to the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are in enough servers to have the server list scrollable - Go to a server all the way at the bottom - Ask someone to send an invite link to a server you never joined before - Tap the Join button of the invite embed - Open server list drawer
